languages.text: "На Пятом Офелийском соборе был схожий случай спора о вере, и конфликт двух культов разрешили священным поединком. По двадцать поборников вышло с каждой стороны, и обе стороны дали клятву при проигрыше принять учение победителя. Предлагаю сослаться на эдикт собора и разрешить спор тем же путем".

"There was a similar theological dispute at the Fifth Ophelian Council, and the conflict between the two cults was resolved in sacred duel. Twenty champions from each side came forward, both sides vowing to accept the victor's teachings if they lost. I propose to invoke the council's edict and settle the dispute in the same way."
languages.original_text: "На Пятом Офелийском соборе был схожий случай спора о вере, и конфликт двух культов разрешили священным поединком. По двадцать поборников вышло с каждой стороны, и обе стороны дали клятву при проигрыше принять учение победителя. Предлагаю сослаться на эдикт собора и разрешить спор тем же путем".

traits.locale_text: There was a similar case of belief dispute at the Fifth Ophelian Cathedral, and the conflict between the two cults was resolved by a sacred duel. The twenty champions from each side came forward, and both sides vowed to accept the winner's teachings if they lost. I propose to invoke the cathedral's edict and settle the dispute in the same way".

I propose to invoke the cathedral's edict and settle the dispute in the same way".

languages.text: “欧菲利亚第五大教堂也发生过类似的信仰纠纷事件，两个教派之间的冲突通过神圣决斗得到了解决。双方各派出二十位勇士，双方发誓，如果他们输了，就将接受胜利者的教诲。我建议援引大教堂的法令，以同样的方式解决争端。”
languages.original_text: "There was a similar case of belief dispute at the Fifth Ophelian Cathedral, and the conflict between the two cults was resolved in sacred duel. Twenty champions from each side came forward, both sides vowing to accept the victor's teachings if they lost. I propose to invoke the cathedral's edict and settle the dispute in the same way."

traits.locale_text: “欧菲利亚第五大教堂也发生过类似的信仰纠纷事件，两个教派之间的冲突通过神圣决斗得到了解决。双方各派出二十位勇士，双方发誓，如果他们输了，就将接受胜利者的教诲。我建议援引大教堂的法令，以同样的方式解决争端。”

languages.text: «Hubo un caso similar de disputa de creencias en la Quinta Catedral Ofelia, y el conflicto entre los dos cultos se resolvió en duelo sagrado. Veinte campeones de cada bando se presentaron, y ambos juraron aceptar las enseñanzas del vencedor si perdían. Propongo invocar el edicto de la catedral y resolver la disputa del mismo modo».
languages.original_text: "There was a similar case of belief dispute at the Fifth Ophelian Cathedral, and the conflict between the two cults was resolved in sacred duel. Twenty champions from each side came forward, both sides vowing to accept the victor's teachings if they lost. I propose to invoke the cathedral's edict and settle the dispute in the same way."

traits.locale_text: Hubo un caso similar de disputa de creencias en la Quinta Catedral Ofelia, y el conflicto entre los dos cultos se resolvió en duelo sagrado. Veinte campeones de cada bando se presentaron, y ambos juraron aceptar las enseñanzas del vencedor si perdían. Propongo invocar el edicto de la catedral y resolver la disputa del mismo modo».

languages.text: オフィーリア第五大聖堂でも同様の信仰についての紛争があり、2つの魔女団の対立が聖なる決闘で解決されたのだ。双方から20人の擁護者が名乗りを上げ、負けたら勝者の教えを受け入れることを誓った。大聖堂の勅令を出して、同じ方法で紛争を解決することを提案しよう」
languages.original_text: "There was a similar case of belief dispute at the Fifth Ophelian Cathedral, and the conflict between the two cults was resolved in sacred duel. Twenty champions from each side came forward, both sides vowing to accept the victor's teachings if they lost. I propose to invoke the cathedral's edict and settle the dispute in the same way."

traits.locale_text: オフィーリア第五大聖堂でも同様の信仰についての紛争があり、2つの魔女団の対立が聖なる決闘で解決されたのだ。双方から20人の擁護者が名乗りを上げ、負けたら勝者の教えを受け入れることを誓った。大聖堂の勅令を出して、同じ方法で紛争を解決することを提案しよう」

languages.text: « Un cas similaire s'était présenté à la Cinquième Cathédrale Ophélienne, et le conflit entre les deux cultes avait été résolu par un duel sacré. Vingt champions issus des deux camps avaient été désignés, et chaque faction s'était engagée à accepter les enseignements des vainqueurs. Je propose de nous en remettre à l'édit de la Cathédrale et de régler le différend de cette manière. »
languages.original_text: "There was a similar case of belief dispute at the Fifth Ophelian Cathedral, and the conflict between the two cults was resolved in sacred duel. Twenty champions from each side came forward, both sides vowing to accept the victor's teachings if they lost. I propose to invoke the cathedral's edict and settle the dispute in the same way."

traits.locale_text: « Un cas similaire s'était présenté à la Cinquième Cathédrale Ophélienne, et le conflit entre les deux cultes avait été résolu par un duel sacré. Vingt champions issus des deux camps avaient été désignés, et chaque faction s'était engagée à accepter les enseignements des vainqueurs. Je propose de nous en remettre à l'édit de la Cathédrale et de régler le différend de cette manière. »

languages.text: "In der Fünften Ophelischen Kathedrale gab es einen ähnlichen Glaubensstreit, und der Konflikt zwischen den beiden Kulten wurde durch ein heiliges Duell beigelegt. Zwanzig Streiter von jeder Seite traten vor, und beide Seiten schworen, im Falle ihrer Niederlage die Lehren des Siegers anzunehmen. Ich schlage vor, dem Edikt der Kathedrale zu folgen und den Streit auf die gleiche Weise beizulegen."
languages.original_text: "There was a similar case of belief dispute at the Fifth Ophelian Cathedral, and the conflict between the two cults was resolved in sacred duel. Twenty champions from each side came forward, both sides vowing to accept the victor's teachings if they lost. I propose to invoke the cathedral's edict and settle the dispute in the same way."

Ich schlage vor, dem Edikt der Kathedrale zu folgen und den Streit auf die gleiche Weise beizulegen."

languages.text: "Beşinci Ofelya Katedrali'nde de benzer bir inanç tartışması yaşanmıştı ve iki tarikat arasındaki anlaşmazlık, kutsal düello ile çözülmüştü. Her iki taraftan yirmişer şampiyon ona çıkmış ve iki taraf da mağlubiyet durumunda galibin öğretilerini kabul edeceğine ant içmişti. Katedral'in buyruğunu uygulayarak tartışmayı aynı şekilde çözmeyi öneriyorum."
languages.original_text: "There was a similar case of belief dispute at the Fifth Ophelian Cathedral, and the conflict between the two cults was resolved in sacred duel. Twenty champions from each side came forward, both sides vowing to accept the victor's teachings if they lost. I propose to invoke the cathedral's edict and settle the dispute in the same way."
